makeupStyles.name: Glam Night Look
makeupStyles.description: Creating a bold and dramatic evening look with smoky eyes and a flawless base.
steps: Start with a clean and moisturized face.
Apply a hydrating primer to create a smooth base.
Use a full-coverage foundation to achieve a flawless complexion.
Apply concealer under the eyes and on any blemishes.
Set the foundation with a translucent powder.
Use a dark eyeshadow (black or deep gray) on the eyelids.
Blend a medium gray eyeshadow into the crease for depth.
Apply a shimmery silver eyeshadow on the center of the eyelid.
Use a black eyeliner to create a dramatic winged effect.
Add false lashes for extra volume and drama.
Finish with a bold red or deep nude lipstick.

makeupStyles.name: Soft Nude Look
makeupStyles.description: Achieving a fresh and natural everyday look with nude shades and a radiant glow.
steps: Start with a clean and moisturized face.
Apply a lightweight BB cream or tinted moisturizer for a natural finish.
Use a soft beige eyeshadow on the eyelids.
Blend a light brown eyeshadow into the crease for subtle definition.
Apply a soft highlighter on the brow bone and inner corners of the eyes.
Groom the eyebrows for a natural yet polished appearance.
Apply a light coat of brown mascara to the upper lashes.
Use a cream blush on the cheeks for a natural flush.
Apply a sheer nude lipstick or lip gloss for a minimalist vibe.

makeupStyles.name: Dewy Korean Look
makeupStyles.description: A fresh and dewy look inspired by Korean beauty trends.
steps: Begin with a clean and hydrated face.
Apply a hydrating essence to prep the skin.
Use a light foundation or BB cream for a natural finish.
Add a cream blush to the cheeks for a youthful glow.
Apply a highlighter on the high points of the face (cheekbones, nose, brow bone).
Use a light eyeshadow in soft pastel colors on the eyelids.
Apply a thin line of eyeliner along the upper lash line.
Finish with a glossy lip tint for a fresh look.

makeupStyles.name: Retro Vintage Look
makeupStyles.description: A classic look with bold lips and defined eyes.
steps: Start with a clean and moisturized face.
Apply a matte foundation for a flawless base.
Use a concealer to cover any imperfections.
Set the foundation with a translucent powder.
Define the eyebrows with a brow pencil for a bold look.
Apply a light eyeshadow on the eyelids.
Use a bold red lipstick for the lips.
Create a winged eyeliner look for dramatic eyes.
Add a touch of blush to the cheeks for a vintage feel.

makeupStyles.name: Bold Cat Eye
makeupStyles.description: A striking cat-eye look that enhances the eyes.
steps: Begin with a clean and moisturized face.
Apply a primer to the eyelids to help the eyeshadow stay in place.
Use a light beige eyeshadow as a base on the eyelids.
Apply a dark black or brown eyeshadow on the outer corners.
Blend the dark eyeshadow into the crease for a smoky effect.
Use a liquid eyeliner to create a bold cat-eye wing.
Apply mascara to the upper and lower lashes for volume.
Finish with a nude or soft pink lipstick.

makeupStyles.name: Natural Glow
makeupStyles.description: A fresh and radiant look for everyday wear.
steps: Start with a clean and hydrated face.
Apply a lightweight foundation or BB cream for a natural finish.
Use a cream blush on the apples of the cheeks.
Highlight the cheekbones with a liquid highlighter.
Apply a light eyeshadow in soft neutral tones.
Define the eyebrows with a brow gel for a natural look.
Finish with a tinted lip balm for hydration.

makeupStyles.name: Festival Glam
makeupStyles.description: A fun and colorful look perfect for festivals.
steps: Begin with a clean and moisturized face.
Apply a bright eyeshadow base on the eyelids.
Use vibrant colors like pink, blue, and purple on the eyelids.
Add glitter to the center of the eyelids for sparkle.
Use a bold eyeliner to create dramatic lines.
Apply false lashes for extra drama.
Finish with a bright lip color to match the eyes.

makeupStyles.name: Classic Hollywood
makeupStyles.description: A glamorous look inspired by classic Hollywood stars.
steps: Start with a clean and moisturized face.
Apply a full-coverage foundation for a flawless complexion.
Use a concealer to cover dark circles and blemishes.
Set the foundation with a translucent powder.
Define the eyebrows with a brow pencil for a polished look.
Apply a shimmery eyeshadow on the eyelids.
Create a classic winged eyeliner look.
Finish with a bold red lipstick for that Hollywood glam.

makeupStyles.name: Sunset Eyes
makeupStyles.description: A warm and colorful eye look inspired by sunsets.
steps: Begin with a clean and moisturized face.
Apply a primer to the eyelids.
Use a warm orange eyeshadow on the eyelids.
Blend a pink eyeshadow into the crease.
Apply a shimmery gold eyeshadow on the inner corners.
Use a brown eyeliner to define the eyes.
Finish with a coat of mascara on the lashes.
Apply a soft peach lip color to complement the eyes.

makeupStyles.name: Minimalist Chic
makeupStyles.description: A simple and elegant look for minimalists.
steps: Start with a clean and hydrated face.
Apply a tinted moisturizer for a natural glow.
Use a light blush on the cheeks.
Define the eyebrows with a brow gel.
Apply a light eyeshadow in neutral tones.
Finish with a nude lip color for a minimalist vibe.

makeupStyles.name: Edgy Smoky Eye
makeupStyles.description: A bold and edgy smoky eye look.
steps: Begin with a clean and moisturized face.
Apply a primer to the eyelids.
Use a dark eyeshadow (black or deep gray) on the eyelids.
Blend a medium gray eyeshadow into the crease.
Apply a shimmery silver eyeshadow on the center of the eyelid.
Use a black eyeliner to create a dramatic wing.
Finish with a coat of mascara on the lashes.
Apply a bold lip color to complete the look.

makeupStyles.name: Bright and Bold
makeupStyles.description: A vibrant and colorful look for those who love to stand out.
steps: Start with a clean and moisturized face.
Apply a bright eyeshadow base on the eyelids.
Use vibrant colors like yellow, pink, and blue on the eyelids.
Blend the colors together for a seamless look.
Use a bold eyeliner to define the eyes.
Finish with a bright lip color to match the eyes.

makeupStyles.name: Elegant Evening Look
makeupStyles.description: A sophisticated look for evening events.
steps: Begin with a clean and moisturized face.
Apply a full-coverage foundation for a flawless base.
Use a concealer to cover any imperfections.
Set the foundation with a translucent powder.
Define the eyebrows with a brow pencil.
Apply a soft eyeshadow in neutral tones.
Use a darker shade in the crease for depth.
Finish with a classic red lipstick.
